movies.title: Monsterz
movies.plot: A battle between a man who can control people with a stare, and the only man he cannot control. When their fate cross, the survival battle begins. The two men with inevitable fate, who will survive ?
movies.simplePlot: A battle between a man who can control people with a stare, and the only man he cannot control. When their fate cross, the survival battle begins. The two men with inevitable fate, who will survive ?

biography.bio: Mina Fujii is an actress, known for Jossy's (2014), Simsons (2006) and My New Sassy Girl (2016).
biography.name: Mina Fujii

biography.bio: Tatsuya Fujiwara was born on May 15, 1982 in Chichibu, Japan. He is known for his work on Battle Royale (2000), Le Cahier de la Mort (2006) and Death Note: The Last Name (2006).
biography.name: Tatsuya Fujiwara

biography.bio: Satomi Ishihara was born on December 24, 1986 in Tokyo, Japan as Kuniko Ishigami. She is an actress, known for Shin Godzilla (2016), Attack on Titan: Part 1 (2015) and My Grandpa (2003).
biography.name: Satomi Ishihara

biography.bio: Tatsuya Kawajiri is an actor, known for EA Sports MMA (2010), Pride Shockwave 2006 (2006) and Pride Bushido 11: Bushido Survival (2006).
biography.name: Tatsuya Kawajiri

biography.bio: Tae Kimura was born on March 16, 1971 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for All Around Us (2008), After Life (1998) and Hana and Alice (2004).
biography.name: Tae Kimura

biography.bio: Yutaka Matsushige was born on January 19, 1963 in Fukuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Solitary Gourmet (2012), Ringu (1998) and Last Life in the Universe (2003).
biography.name: Yutaka Matsushige

biography.bio: Masaki Miura was born on November 16, 1975 in Wakayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Outrage (2010), Linda Linda Linda (2005) and Sketches of Kaitan City (2010). He has been married to Ai Sasamine since January 11, 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Masaki Miura

biography.bio: Motoki Ochiai is an actor, known for Love Exposure (2008), The Kirishima Thing (2012) and Gantz (2010).
biography.name: Motoki Ochiai

biography.bio: Tomorô Taguchi was born on November 30, 1957 in Tokyo, Japan as Tomorou Taguchi. He is an actor and director, known for Tetsuo, the Iron Man (1989), Tetsuo II: Body Hammer (1992) and Non-Stop (1996).
biography.name: Tomorô Taguchi

biography.bio: Taiga is an actor, known for Sweet Bean (2015), Au revoir l'été (2013) and The Kirishima Thing (2012).
biography.name: Taiga

biography.bio: Japanese actor, born on 20th October 1983, teen heartthrob Yamada Takayuki, first started out co-starring in a handful of Jdoramas before making a big splash on Waterboys (2003). He followed with Fireboys (2004), his award winning performance in Crying Out Love, in the Center of the World (2004), Churasan 3 and the recent H2 (2005). His remarkable acting makes him most outstanding among the younger generation of Japanese actors.
biography.name: Takayuki Yamada

camera: Arri Alexa Studio, Zeiss Master Prime and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
